mapper.select: select faq_no, main_cate_no, query_no, title, content, path, reg_dt from gms_faq order by faq_no desc
select faq_no, main_cate_no, query_no, title, content, path, reg_dt from gms_faq where faq_no=#{no}
mapper.insert: insert into gms_faq(main_cate_no, query_no, title, content, path, reg_dt) values(#{maincateno}, #{queryno}, #{title}, #{content}, #{path}, #{regdt})
mapper.update: update gms_faq set main_cate_no = #{maincateno}, query_no = #{queryno}, title = #{title}, content = #{content}, path = #{path}, reg_dt = #{regdt} where faq_no = #{no}
